name: Golden Shackles
description:
Controls:

  • Left click the work table to craft gold jewelry
  • Left click the phone and magazines corner to order upgrades

Rules are simple; consume this gold as fast as you can to beat the game.

To do that you will need to:

  • Craft gold items to sell
  • Use the money to buy upgrades
  • Craft higher items to consume more gold and get more money
  • Consume all gold in pots to win

Have fun and leave comments :)

Thank you.
